body:
Comment 3: 
For comparison, this is what gccgo prints:

foo.go:15:28: error: argument 1 must be a slice
    searchP.wanted = append(searchP, k)
                            ^
foo.go:17:30: error: argument 1 must be a slice
    searchP.unwanted = append(searchP, k)
                              ^
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**, **release-go1.5**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
